TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimerDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about this class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TimerDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Timer> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the HTML markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the markup used to render the control at design time.
